name: Collection Quest
description:
Collection Quest is a simple story/lore-driven collectathon.
With an emphasis on Free Roam Exploration.
It was Inspired by Retro + Flash games.

Prepare for an Old-School adventure with modern twist!
Engage with its denizens and leave no stone unturned.

Complete quest, solve puzzles and get lost in a strange new world!

Remember to Interact with Everything!

Adventure Awaits!

Features:


  • Casual-friendly accessible gameplay with puzzles and story elements that still respect the player
  • Engaging and intractable world populated with unique characters
  • Varied quest and ways to collect all the games relics
  • Overarching story/lore-driven experience
  • Filled to the brim with secrets to discover
  • 100 Achievements to Collect!
  • Rich VO dialog
  • Controller support
  • Local and Remote-Play Split-Screen CO-OP
  • Retro style graphics with a flavorful bit of modern touches, hmm, Delicious
  • Attention to detail around every corner 🎱
